title: Sherlock Holmes, The Missing Cases
description: Arthur Conan Doyle wrote dozens of stories about Sherlock Holmes. Some of those stories are less known than others despite being even better and providing essential information about the characters. This is a selection of the following cases: The Mazarin Stone, The Problem of Thor Bridge, The Creeping Man, The Adventure of the Sussex Vampire, The Three Garridebs, and The Illustrious Client.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
